headline.main: The Latest: Reporter Says Bomb Threat Suspect Harassed Him
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Reporter Says Bomb Threat Suspect Harassed Him

lead_paragraph: The repricing wave that has swept through the US leveraged loan market is gathering momentum in the riskier second-lien market as tumbling institutional term loan yields open the door to issuers seeking to cut borrowing costs further down the capital structure.
